fuzzygroup¶

Contains membership function group (MFGroup) definition.

MFGroups serve as named collections of membership functions and has a method for plotting.

An example of a group could be ‘temperature’, comprised of membership functions such as ‘cold’, ‘warm’, and ‘hot’.

Classes

FuzzyGroup(name, xmin, xmax, fns)

A collection of membership functions corresponding to fuzzy sets.

HotFIS
